effect.@en: Whenever a weapon with this Quality is fired, it affects multiple targets in a Burst Template. The Smoke’s effects remain immobile for 1D10+1 minutes, but a heavy wind will disperse it after one minute has passed. Those who stand inside or fire into the Smoke cannot use the Medium or Long Distance values of ranged weapons, while attacks made with weapons or Magick outside of Engaged suffer additional penalties to strike.
